summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to the FBI, attaching a scheduling order and dial-in information for a conference on April 23, 2021. It indicates ongoing legal proceedings related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, attaching a scheduling order and dial-in information for a conference, and wishing the recipient well on a trip.

events.title: Legal Conference
events.description: A conference was scheduled, with dial-in information provided in an attached order.

locations.context: Office address of the Assistant United States Attorney, Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York was coordinating a legal conference related to the Epstein case in April 2021.
The communication was directed to the FBI, indicating federal law enforcement involvement in the proceedings.
The email references an attached scheduling order with dial-in information, suggesting the conference was a formal court proceeding or hearing.
